attributes.action: Make Brixton a memorial spot for The Bullies
attributes.additional_details:
big family in Brixton and have supported Brixton, Further more there should be a Memorial statue outside or near Brixton underground station
Thank you for reading and signing this petition LETS GET BRIXTON GOOD AGAIN
attributes.background:
I really want this because Brixton is the home of the Bullies,
The bullies are a family tree which date back to 1512. They are a very

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local memorials are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
